db:abstract.db:para: The QTextTableCellFormat class provides formatting information for table cells in a QTextDocument.

db:note.db:para: All functions in this class are reentrant.

db:listitem.db:para: QTextTableCellFormat is part of Rich Text Processing APIsshared

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The table cell format of a table cell in a document specifies the visual properties of the table cell.
The padding properties of a table cell are controlled by setLeftPadding(), setRightPadding(), setTopPadding(), and setBottomPadding(). All the paddings can be set at once using setPadding().

db:section.db:title: QTextTableCellFormat::QTextTableCellFormat()
db:section.db:para: Constructs a new table cell format object.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.14] qreal QTextTableCellFormat::bottomBorder() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the bottom border width of the table cell.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.14.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.14] QBrush QTextTableCellFormat::bottomBorderBrush() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the bottom border brush of the table cell.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.14.

db:section.db:title: [since 5.14] QTextFrameFormat::BorderStyle QTextTableCellFormat::bottomBorderStyle() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the bottom border style of the table cell.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.14.

db:section.db:title: qreal QTextTableCellFormat::bottomPadding() const
db:section.db:para: Gets the bottom padding of the table cell.

db:section.db:title: bool QTextTableCellFormat::isValid() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this table cell format is valid; otherwise returns false.
